attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description:
Finance available. Trade-ins welcome. Delivery nationwide. Transport, admin and license fees excluded
Brand BMW
Model X5
Generation X5
Modification (Engine) 30d (245 Hp) xDrive Automatic
Internal Combustion engine
Body type SUV
Seats 5
Doors 5
Performance specs
Fuel consumption (economy) - urban 8.7 l/100 km (11.49 km/l)
Fuel consumption (economy) - extra urban 6.7 l/100 km (14.93 km/l)
Fuel consumption (economy) - combined 7.4 l/100 km (13.51 km/l)
Fuel Type Diesel
Acceleration 0 - 100 km/h 7.6 sec
Maximum speed 210 km/h
Engine specs
Power 182kw @ 4000 rpm.
Torque 540 Nm @ 1750-3000 rpm.
Engine location Front, Longitudinal
Engine displacement 2993 cm3
Number of cylinders 6
Position of cylinders Inline
Number of valves per cylinder 4
Fuel System Diesel Commonrail
Engine aspiration Turbocharger
Engine oil capacity 6.7 l
Coolant 10.4 l
Space, Volume and weights
Kerb Weight 2075 kg
Max. weight 2755 kg
Max load 680 kg
Trunk (boot) space - minimum 620 l
Trunk (boot) space - maximum 1750 l
Fuel tank capacity 85 l
Max. roof load 100 kg
Permitted trailer load with brakes (12%) 3500 kg
Permitted trailer load without brakes 750 kg
Permitted towbar download 140 kg
Dimensions
Length 4857 mm
Width 1933 mm
Width including mirrors 2197 mm
Height 1776 mm
Wheelbase 2933 mm
Front track 1644 mm
Rear (Back) track 1650 mm
Front overhang 864 mm
Rear overhang 1060 mm
Ride height (ground clearance) 222 mm
Minimum turning circle (turning diameter) 12.8 m
Approach angle 25.5°
Departure angle 22.7°
Ramp-over (brakeover) angle 19.8°
Wading depth 500 mm
Drivetrain, brakes and suspension specs
Drive wheel All wheel drive (4x4)
Number of Gears (automatic transmission) 8
Front brakes Ventilated discs
Rear brakes Ventilated discs
Assisting systems ABS (Anti-lock braking system)
Steering type Steering rack and pinion
Tires size 255/55 R18
Wheel rims size 8.5J x 18
